name: Step To The End
description:
Step To The End. This game is made by the help of brackeys tutorial but instead I made a coins system, and I will keep working on this game to learn more because I'm a beginner. In this  game you are a cube and you need to avoid obstacles and collect coins . You control the player by A and D. In the next updates I will add more things .
What's New V.0.2 !

In this update you get an extra level to play. And a level selection menu. 
More to come in the next updates. 
Note: the name of the game has changed from (Cube Game ?) to (Step To The End) because the first name is overused
